welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kumamoto, Japan! Get ready to explore the charm of this historic city, known for its stunning castle, beautiful gardens, and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make the most of all Kumamoto has to offer!

restaurants.name: Korantei (紅蘭亭 下通本店)
restaurants.description: Korantei (紅蘭亭 下通本店) is a chinese restaurant located in 熊本市.
restaurants.address: 中央区安政町5-26, 熊本市, 熊本県, 860-0801

restaurants.name: Sri Lanka Kumamoto (スリランカくまもと)
restaurants.description: Sri Lanka Kumamoto (スリランカくまもと) is a sri lankan restaurant located in 熊本市.
restaurants.address: 中央区下通1-4-3 (熊本ビル 2F), 熊本市, 熊本県, 860-0807

restaurants.name: Uma-Sakura (馬桜 熊本下通り店)
restaurants.description: Uma-Sakura (馬桜 熊本下通り店) is a japanese restaurant located in 熊本市.
restaurants.address: 中央区下通1-12-1 (光園ビル 2F), 熊本市, 熊本県, 860-0807

restaurants.name: Niboraya (にぼらや 酒場通り店)
restaurants.description: Niboraya (にぼらや 酒場通り店) is a ramen restaurant located in 熊本市.

restaurants.name: Katsuretsu Tei (勝烈亭 新市街本店)
restaurants.description: Katsuretsu Tei (勝烈亭 新市街本店) is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 熊本市.
restaurants.address: 中央区新市街8-18, 熊本市, 熊本県, 860-0803
